name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in developing high-quality user interfaces and applications utilizing expert knowledge in **TypeScript**, **React**, and **UI/UX design** principles. Proficient in building scalable APIs and managing SQL databases like **PostgreSQL**, while delivering on cloud services via **AWS** infrastructure. I have hands-on experience with modern testing frameworks such as **Cypress** to ensure robust application performance and user satisfaction. Additionally, my background in **Python** and developing applications within **Docker** and **Kubernetes** ecosystems enhances my versatility in collaborative environments. 

My previous roles have enabled me to lead initiatives in microservices architecture and implement CI/CD pipelines, promoting seamless integration, quality assurance, and accelerated deployment cycles. I am committed to continuous improvement and driving innovation, resulting in optimized performance and enhanced user experiences.
